title: Supervised Learning of Semantics-Preserving Hashing via Deep Neural Networks for Large-Scale Image Search
authors: HF Yang, K Lin, CS Chen - arXiv preprint arXiv:1507.00101
excerpt: Abstract: This paper presents a supervised deep hashing approach that constructs binary hash codes from labeled data for large-scale image search. We assume that semantic labels are governed by a set of latent attributes in which each attribute can be on or off, and  ...
